channel.title: Paladin Wtf Sher
channel.description:
My suggestion is simple. Make paladin more useful. Ever since, well, both paladin and sheriff become convertible convertable.. They've seemed less beneficial, as well idk just seems like it lol.
So here's my suggestion: add an ability to sheriff and paladin that allows one use to revert an unseen or cult to back to BD. Could he one use idc I might be tired and this may not be a good idea but hey. I'm tired might as well.
Anyways, I think this should be added for sheriff and paladin to be able to convert or rather unconvert, because they're essentially the counter measures against unseen and cult and they're, well, they're supposed to be their worst enemy yet I feel they lack true purpose in a game that surrounds conversion.
And as for the roles like Assassin and stuff, blue dragon equivalent is kind of knight tbh. So Assassin - - >knight and same for apostle. But then mm and CL would he immune, lol wouldn't matter the converted to bd would snitch probably. Oh shit didn't think about that, looks like the Assassin better kill that damn traitor. Poop oh wait nvm.
They could just take cyanide pills. If you're mm or CL you could use an ability called Cyanide Release which forces the traitorous swine to pop a pill killing them instantly. One time use.
